label: General updates

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• VacuumAoE increased from 250/350/450/550 to 400/450/500/550
  • Vacuum cooldown rescaled from 32 to 60/50/40/30

  • Vacuum damage rescaled from 40/80/120/160 to 25/50/100/200
  • Wall of Replicaincoming illusion damage reduced from 400% to 300%
  • Wall of Replica width increased from 1000 to 1300

descriptionHtml:

  • Bedlamcooldown increased from 40/30/20 to 40/35/30

descriptionHtml: • Poison Touchdamage increased from 10/20/30/40 to 10/24/38/52

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:

  • Silencemana cost increased from 80 to 80/90/100/110

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Static Stormno longer lingers on your hero for 0.5 seconds after walking away from the AoE (it already ends immediately once the spell is over)
  • Kinetic Fieldcooldown increased from 13/12/11/10 to 19/16/13/10

descriptionHtml: • Precision Auraattack damage bonus increased from 10/18/26/34% to 10/20/30/40%

descriptionHtml:

label: Io
descriptionHtml:
• Tethernow sets your movement speed to match the tethered target's speed
  • Tether no longer has a duration
  • Tether movement speed rescaled from 10/12/14/16% to 7/10/13/16%
  • Tether regen sharing rescaled from 1.5× to 1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5×
  • Relocatecooldown increased from 120/100/80 to 130/110/90
  • Base damage reduced by 4

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 325 to 330
  • Lightning Stormdamage rescaled from 50/100/150/200 to 80/120/160/200
  • Lightning Storm slow duration rescaled from 0.7/0.8/0.9/1 to 0.4/0.6/0.8/1

descriptionHtml: • Stifling Daggercan be targeted on Spell Immune (the slow won't have any effect, but the physical damage will go through)

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Supernovaradius increased from 1000 to 1300
  • Supernova now turns night into day for the duration (has highest priority)

label: Razor
descriptionHtml:
• Static Linkcast range reduced from 600 to 550 (break range still 800)
  • Unstable Currentdamage reduced from 100/130/160/190 to 60/100/140/180

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Tricks of the Tradereworked: Instead of hitting every hero in the AoE once per second, it hits a random hero once per 0.5/0.45/0.4 seconds
  • Tricks of the Trade will hit creeps if there are no heroes available
  • Tricks of the Trade duration increased from 3/4/5 to 4/5/6

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml: • Telekinesiscooldown increased from 22 to 28/26/24/22

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Demonic Purgeslow now always scales linearly with time from 100% to 20%
  • Demonic Purge cooldown increased from 40 to 60 (affects charge replenish)
  • Demonic Purge duration increased from 5 to 7 seconds
  • Demonic Purge no longer roots non-hero units for 3 seconds
  • Demonic Purge now continuously dispels the target

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:

  • Turn rate improved from 0.5 to 0.6

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml:
